org.graylog2.gelfclient.encoder

Class GelfMessageChunkEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder<io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf>
          • org.graylog2.gelfclient.encoder.GelfMessageChunkEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandler

    @ChannelHandler.Sharable
public class GelfMessageChunkEncoder
extends io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder<io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf>
    A Netty channel handler which splits large GELF messages into chunked GELF messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

        io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler.Sharable

    • Constructor Detail

      • GelfMessageChunkEncoder

        public GelfMessageChunkEncoder(byte[] machineIdentifier)
        Creates a new instance with a given machine identifier used in the generation of the message ID.

        Usually the hostname of the client makes a good enough machine identifier.

        Parameters:
        machineIdentifier - the machine identifier (only the first 4 bytes are being used)

      • GelfMessageChunkEncoder

        public GelfMessageChunkEncoder()
        Creates a new instance with a random machine identifier used in the generation of the message ID.
